page.title: 19Typical Sunday, N. Lopham
page.content:
I woke up at 8.30 a.m.. I got dressed and went downstairs. For breakfast we had bacon and eggs. After breakfast my brother, my dad and I went to the building site at Wortham. We are building our own house and we hope to move in soon. At the building site we put the electrical plugs and switches in. My mum and my sister stayed at home to make cakes.
When we got back we had lunch - a sandwich and a packet of crisps. After lunch we all went upstairs and got our clothes and a washbag to take on holiday with us. (We are going to the Dordogne in France.) Then we went downstairs and had dinner. For dinner we had roast lamb with potatoes and peas. In the evening we all watched television.
